entry.title: 测试文档
entry.content:

测试文本

用C语言打印Hello World

我的B站

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

@font-face { font-family: "iconfont"; /* Project id 5026488 */ src: url('//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_5026488_bl61zqp7kme.woff2?t=1758353458835') format('woff2'), url('//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_5026488_bl61zqp7kme.woff?t=1758353458835') format('woff'), url('//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_5026488_bl61zqp7kme.ttf?t=1758353458835') format('truetype');}.iconfont { font-family: "iconfont" !important; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;}.icon-icon_bilibili:before { content: "\e600";}

// 自定义 Valine 验证document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { // 监听 Valine 初始化完成 const valineObserver = setInterval(function() { if (document.querySelector('#vcomments .vbtn')) { clearInterval(valineObserver); setupValineValidation(); } }, 500);});function setupValineValidation() { const submitBtn = document.querySelector('#vcomments .vbtn'); if (submitBtn) { submitBtn.addEventListener('click', function(e) { const nickInput = document.querySelector('#vcomments input.vnick'); const mailInput = document.querySelector('#vcomments input.vmail'); if (!nickInput.value.trim()) { e.preventDefault(); alert('请输入昵称'); nickInput.focus(); return false; } if (!mailInput.value.trim()) { e.preventDefault(); alert('请输入邮箱'); mailInput.focus(); return false; } // 简单的邮箱格式验证 const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/; if (!emailRegex.test(mailInput.value)) { e.preventDefault(); alert('请输入有效的邮箱地址'); mailInput.focus(); return false; } }); }}
